excerpt: "Stampli, a leader in AI-driven Accounts Payable (AP) automation, announced today that Jeff Zamczyk has been promoted to chief revenue officer (CRO). Zamczyk joined Stampli in 2019 and most recently held the title of vice president of sales and customer success."
